hero.description: From the fertile lands of Egypt to your doorstep - delivering the finest quality bananas with premium export services.

eliteHero.description: From Egypt's fertile lands to the world's finest markets - delivering premium quality bananas with unmatched export excellence.

intro.label: Who We Are
intro.subtitle: Delivering premium quality bananas from farm to global markets
intro.heading: Your Trusted Partner in Premium Banana Exports
intro.paragraph1: Al-Wafaa is a leading Egyptian banana export company, dedicated to bringing the finest quality bananas from Egypt's fertile Nile Delta to markets around the world. With years of experience in agricultural export, we have built a reputation for excellence, reliability, and unwavering commitment to quality.
intro.paragraph2: We work directly with local farmers, ensuring that every banana meets our strict quality standards. Our state-of-the-art facilities and efficient logistics network guarantee that your products arrive fresh, on time, and in perfect condition - every single time.

certifications.label: Trust & Compliance
certifications.title: Certifications & Standards
certifications.description: Our commitment to excellence is validated by internationally recognized certifications and rigorous quality standards

iso9001.name: ISO 9001:2015
iso9001.description: International standard for quality management systems ensuring consistent quality and customer satisfaction.

iso22000.name: ISO 22000
iso22000.description: Global food safety management standard covering the entire food chain from farm to fork.

haccp.name: HACCP
haccp.description: Systematic preventive approach to food safety identifying and controlling biological, chemical, and physical hazards.

globalGap.name: GlobalGAP
globalGap.description: Leading farm assurance program translating consumer requirements into good agricultural practices worldwide.

organic.name: Organic Certification
organic.description: Certified organic production methods ensuring products meet strict organic standards without synthetic inputs.

fairTrade.name: Fair Trade
fairTrade.description: Commitment to fair prices, decent working conditions, and sustainable farming practices for producers.

qualityStandards.label: Quality Assurance
qualityStandards.title: Our Quality Standards
qualityStandards.description: Beyond certifications, we implement comprehensive quality control measures at every stage of our operations to ensure excellence in every shipment.

companyStory.label: Our Journey
companyStory.title: Our Story
companyStory.paragraph1: Our journey began with a simple yet powerful vision: to deliver the world's finest fresh produce while maintaining the highest standards of quality and sustainability. What started as a family-owned operation has grown into a trusted global partner.
companyStory.paragraph2: Through decades of dedication, we've built lasting relationships with farmers, suppliers, and customers across continents. Every piece of fruit that leaves our facilities carries with it our commitment to excellence and our passion for what we do.
companyStory.paragraph3: Today, we stand as industry leaders not just in volume, but in innovation, sustainability, and the unwavering quality that has become our hallmark.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Delivering Nature's Best to Every Corner of the World
mission.description: We are committed to bridging the gap between the world's finest growers and discerning customers globally. Our mission extends beyond logistics—we're cultivating a sustainable future where quality, integrity, and environmental responsibility are never compromised.
points: Sustainable practices from farm to table

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.description: To be recognized globally as the most trusted name in fresh produce exports—where quality meets sustainability, and every harvest tells a story of excellence.

companyValues.label: What Drives Us
companyValues.title: Our Core Values
companyValues.description: The principles that guide every decision we make and define who we are as a company

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: Every product meets the highest international standards through rigorous selection and quality control processes.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to environmental stewardship and sustainable practices that protect our planet for future generations.

customerSatisfaction.title: Customer Satisfaction
customerSatisfaction.description: Building lasting relationships through exceptional service, reliability, and unwavering commitment to our clients.

companyValues.quote: Our values aren't just words on a page—they're the foundation of every relationship we build and every promise we keep.

storageHandling.label: Best Practices
storageHandling.title: Storage & Handling
storageHandling.description: Comprehensive guidelines to ensure optimal freshness and quality from arrival to final destination

temperature.title: Temperature Control
temperature.description: Maintain optimal temperature throughout storage and transport
items: Never below 12°C to prevent chilling injury

humidity.title: Humidity Management
humidity.description: Proper humidity levels prevent moisture loss and premature ripening

handling.title: Handling Procedures
handling.description: Careful handling ensures product integrity and extends shelf life
items: Handle with care to avoid bruising

bestPractices.title: Best Practices by Phase
bestPractices.subtitle: Step-by-step guidelines for each stage of the supply chain

warnings.title: Important Considerations
points: Never store with ethylene-producing fruits (apples, avocados)
Avoid direct sunlight or heat sources
Ensure proper ventilation at all times
warnings.noteText: These guidelines are based on industry best practices and international standards. Specific requirements may vary depending on destination market regulations and customer preferences. Always consult relevant documentation and local authorities.
